author: Jenny
title: Handheld Milk Frother $5.29 (reg. $20) at Amazon :: Southern Savers
text: Welcome to Southern Savers, where finding deals and steals is simple and rewarding! See I told you, this would help! [Coupon Abbreviations](http://www.southernsavers.com/coupon-facts/#coupon-lang-and-lingo) - SC = Store Coupon - MC = Manufacturer Coupon - SS = Smart Source - RMN = Retail Me Not - PG = Proctor and Gamble [Coupon Terms](http://www.southernsavers.com/coupon-facts/#coupon-lang-and-lingo) - WYB = When You Buy - B1G1 = Buy One Get One Free - .75/1 = 75 cents off one item - .75/3 = 75 cents off three items - EXP = Expiration Date Going Nuts? I can help you understand [coupon terms](http://www.southernsavers.com/coupon-facts/#coupon-lang-and-lingo) and [abbreviations](http://www.southernsavers.com/coupon-facts/#coupon-lang-and-lingo) [Home](https://www.southernsavers.com/) > [Amazon](https://www.southernsavers.com/amazon/) > Handheld Milk Frother $5.29 (reg. $20) at Amazon This post may contain affiliate links. Read our disclosure [here](http://www.southernsavers.com/disclosure-policy/). Make your own frothy drinks at home with this [handheld milk frother](https://amzn.to/3NGLn3a). It’s currently on sale for just $5.29 at [Amazon](https://amzn.to/3NGLn3a) (reg. $20)! This price is good on the black color only. This [milk frother](https://amzn.to/3NGLn3a) is battery-operated (not included). To clean, turn on the frother and hold it under a running stream of water for a few seconds – easy peasy! Price is subject to change at any time. Shipping is free for Prime members or free with orders of $25+. See more deals at [Amazon](https://www.southernsavers.com/amazon/).
